name: Hookshot (itch) (comicsansdan)
description:
Hookshot is a prototype concept I made for my game design class.

It takes huge inspiration from the concept of a "Fodian" game (i.e. Getting Over It, Jump King, Pogostuck, etc.)
You guessed it. It's...

Difficult
Unforgiving
Hard
Frustrating...

Good luck!

Credits
Grapple Hook code by Vespper
Sound Effects by Dustyroom
Crosshair by Elizabeth Studio
Tilemap by Cainos
Skybox by Borodar
Character Sprite by Goldmetal Studio
Background Music - 8 Bit Adventure by AdhesiveWombat
